alert.note: Alert for Attala; Carroll; Holmes; Leake; Madison; Rankin; Scott (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 10:09AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WESTERN LEAKE...EASTERN HOLMES... NORTHEASTERN RANKIN...SOUTHERN CARROLL...CENTRAL ATTALA... NORTHWESTERN SCOTT AND NORTHEASTERN MADISON COUNTIES THROUGH 1100 AM CST... At 1009 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Tchula to Cameron to Pisgah. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Durant, Farmhaven, Black Hawk, Newport, Camden, Bowling Green, and Emory around 1015 AM CST. Sallis, Ludlow, and Thomastown around 1020 AM CST. West, Mcadams, and Possumneck around 1025 AM CST. Kosciusko, Carthage, Vaiden, Lena, and Hesterville around 1035 AM CST. Redwater, Tuscola, and Singleton around 1040 AM CST. Smyrna around 1045 AM CST. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Attala; Carroll; Holmes; Leake; Madison; Rankin; Scott
